## SendableEthersBeraBorrow class

Ethers-based implementation of [SendableBeraBorrow](./lib-base.sendableberaborrow.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class SendableEthersBeraBorrow implements SendableBeraBorrow<EthersTransactionReceipt, EthersTransactionResponse>
```

|  [registerFrontend(kickbackRate, overrides)](./lib-ethers.sendableethersberaborrow.registerfrontend.md) |  | Register current wallet address as a BeraBorrow frontend. |
|  [repayLUSD(amount, overrides)](./lib-ethers.sendableethersberaborrow.repaylusd.md) |  | Adjust existing Trove by repaying some of its debt. |
|  [sendLQTY(toAddress, amount, overrides)](./lib-ethers.sendableethersberaborrow.sendlqty.md) |  | Send LQTY tokens to an address. |
|  [sendLUSD(toAddress, amount, overrides)](./lib-ethers.sendableethersberaborrow.sendlusd.md) |  | Send LUSD tokens to an address. |

|  [stakeUniTokens(amount, overrides)](./lib-ethers.sendableethersberaborrow.stakeunitokens.md) |  | Stake Uniswap ETH/LUSD LP tokens to participate in liquidity mining and earn LQTY. |
|  [transferCollateralGainToTrove(overrides)](./lib-ethers.sendableethersberaborrow.transfercollateralgaintotrove.md) |  | Transfer [collateral gain](./lib-base.stabilitydeposit.collateralgain.md) from Stability Deposit to Trove. |
|  [unstakeLQTY(amount, overrides)](./lib-ethers.sendableethersberaborrow.unstakelqty.md) |  | Withdraw LQTY from staking. |

|  [withdrawLQTYRewardFromLiquidityMining(overrides)](./lib-ethers.sendableethersberaborrow.withdrawlqtyrewardfromliquiditymining.md) |  | Withdraw LQTY that has been earned by mining liquidity. |
|  [withdrawLUSDFromStabilityPool(amount, overrides)](./lib-ethers.sendableethersberaborrow.withdrawlusdfromstabilitypool.md) |  | Withdraw LUSD from Stability Deposit. |
